content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Easy enough to solve in a couple minutes, great test cases!

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Fun puzzle, the tests cases are well designed, making it quite easy to find the rules.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: It is a pretty fun challenge for clash of code, took me a little bit over a minute to see that it is binary, i'd say that the cases are clear enough for a reverse challenge, definitely had fun solving it, you have my approval, also the animations at the end are pretty intersting as well :p
In the actual game (not in test IDE), the last set of test cases (Test 10 – Test 14) produces an animation of Conway’s Game Of Life.
